title: Stage Fright (restored, colorized, with intro and outro) (1950, suspense, imdb score: 7)

sources.title: Stage Fright (restored, colorized, with intro and outro) (1950, suspense, imdb score: 7)
sources.description: Stage Fright is a 1950 British  thriller   film noir  directed and produced by  Alfred Hitchcock  and starring  Jane Wyman ,  Marlene Dietrich ,  Michael Wilding  and  Richard Todd . The cast also features  Alastair Sim ,  Sybil Thorndike ,  Kay Walsh , Hitchcock's daughter  Pat Hitchcock  in her film debut, and  Joyce Grenfell  in a  vignette . The story was adapted for the screen by  Whitfield Cook  and  Alma Reville  (the director's wife), with additional dialogue by  James Bridie , based on the 1947 novel  Man Running  by  Selwyn Jepson .
